reviewText:
If you are over forty you will love Hart to Hart.
We are past the violence.  It is really lovely viewing
and at the end you feel you have been entertained.
In typical Hart to Hart fashion, this movie had some mystery, action and of course, romance.  I thought it was a great movie and would recommend it to anyone who enjoyed the Hart to Hart series.
The DVD arrived earlier than promised, was packaged well, priced reasonably and is of good quality. I am a happy customer.

I enjoyed this video as well as the other season dvd sets.  I think Robert Wagoner and Stephanie Powers are terrific chemistry together.  I liked them when the show was in real time and I enjoy it even more now.  Ron
What's not to love?  Glamour, intrigue and romance.
The harts are at it again in this murder, mystery movie, Came in on time & plays great.
Love the Harts! A romantic classic mystery series.
If you loved the series, you will love the TV monnies (there eight of them).
loved it
Love Stephanie Powers and everything she does.  Had to get these just because.  I get in a mood for simple entertainment and this is wonderful.
i have been enjoying watching this movie i love hart to hart. i'm glad i bought this one. it's enjoyible

I am a huge Hart to Hart fan!!  It's great to see those two in action again. In this one, Jonathan almost finds a sister and Robert Wagner's real daughter plays in this. It was great. I hope Sony releases seasons 3,4, and 5 soon.
If you like the series, then the movies are a must. They are hard to find in the stores, if you can find them at all.

Hart to Hart brings back so many fond memories.  Husband and wife in love, rich,good looking and always get themselves in an out of a jam.  You'll enjoy the first one as much as you will the last one.  They don't make 'em like they used to!!!!!
Another good mystery of this movie stefanie and Robert does it again

Great film
basil
my favorite husband and wife detectives!
A decent made-for -tv film.
Awesome
I really wanted this movie but again it was blank when it arrived.
Loved it! Charming, sweet and with so much adventure of course! And dedicated to Lionel Stander 'Max' at the end. Beautiful scenery, San Francisco!
awesome

It was great going on an adventure with Jonathan and Jennifer Hart in San Fancisco for a charity auction with pirates, gold, a possible sister and fun with real family members what more could you ask for.. love these too, I wish there were more too come...Hint hint...
I love the Hart to Hart series and movies  I am a huge fan . I cannot wait for season five of  Hart to Hart to come out in June.
